comment: I owe Blacks absolutely nothing and do not seek forgiveness. If, however, making them 'whole' consists of giving them a hand in returning to their ancestral homelands, I'm all ears!

# ::snt I owe Blacks absolutely nothing and do not seek forgiveness. If, however, making them 'whole' consists of giving them a hand in returning to their ancestral homelands, I'm all ears!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / owe-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (n / nothing
                        :degree (a2 / absolute))
                  :ARG2 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (b / black-05)))
            :op2 (s / seek-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (f / forgive-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 p)))
      :snt2 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-03
                  :ARG1 (m2 / make-02
                        :ARG1 (w / whole
                              :domain p))
                  :ARG2 (g / give-01
                        :ARG1 (h3 / hand)
                        :ARG2 p
                        :purpose (r / return-01
                              :ARG1 p
                              :ARG4 (h4 / homeland
                                    :poss p
                                    :mod (a3 / ancestral)))))
            :ARG2 (e / ear
                  :mod (a4 / all)
                  :domain (ii2 / i))))
